name: Edward Newgate
text: On Play: If you have 2 or more rested Characters, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters of 5 cost or less. Then, KO up to one of your opponents rested Character of 3 cost or less.

effect.text: If you have 2 or more rested Characters, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters of 5 cost or less. Then, KO up to one of your opponents rested Character of 3 cost or less.
